sentences: Küsin sinult, kuidas see on võimalik.
Ta küsib mulle, kas ma tulin homme.
Me küsisime temalt, mis ta arvab.
context: The word 'küsin' is the first-person singular present tense form of the Estonian verb 'küsima', which means 'to ask'. It's used when the speaker is currently or habitually performing the action of asking someone something. The form indicates that 'I' am doing the asking in the present moment.
